data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=g1WC8-FD_zoQ7kNvgFSz9ld&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDrposr9UhVD5f71Cs9yZjVNf7CrrzetPc778EIPyyKsQ&oe=6662CACC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7t3ZklKrLAAQ7kNvgGW1Brq&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBXtllvtMvBzMVMP_aYmC2iOC75KeZo2D9q4s6zmQO98Q&oe=6663011F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035339_749541023684513_3682281630778817377_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9cfrAu9AccIQ7kNvgETHe-Q&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBXCU8IlcgH2hwIJI9xZUw-85sTGsoNeMUDDqbRpsqSTA&oe=6662FFA4)
